```{r}
library(tidyverse)

# Assign the csv file to a variable, and filter for the correct year
IraqData <- read.csv("IraqCSV.csv") %>% 
  filter (Year == '2006')

#Assign the sum of all entries to a new variable
summarizedIraq <- summarize(IraqData, total = sum(Best_est_deaths))

print(summarizedIraq)

```
```{r}

# Plot bar graph for 
ggplot(data = summarizedIraq) +
  geom_bar( mapping = aes (
    x = 'Iraq, 2006', y = total +
      # Add titles
      ylab ('Total number of deaths') +
      ggtitle ("Total estimated deaths in Iraq in 2006")
                           )) 
  


```
